title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Adaptive Learning System-Enabled Mathematics Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary and secondary mathematics foundational knowledge, understanding of basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design personalized learning pathways based on learners' mathematical achievement and preferences
Analyze and apply learner profiling techniques (learning style, progress, comprehension) utilized in adaptive learning systems
Develop an adaptive instructional design model that integrates mathematics education content and assessment tools into an LMS environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
